summary: A small tweak to the "Your Market Stall" mod by wgstein, adding a customizable awning.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]Your Market Awning: An Addon for Your Market Stall[/size][/b]

I love wgstein's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35305/]"Your Market Stall"[/url] mod, but I've often wanted a bit more shelter while I'm tending my shop -- especially for playthroughs with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/]Frostfall[/url] installed. This is my solution.

[b][size=3]What It Does:[/size][/b]

The original mod uses commonchair01 as the base mesh for the market stall. My edit changes that reference to a custom mesh, combining the chair nif with a modified version of whmarketstall02, so that both you and your wares will be covered by an awning. I have also created a number of texture options for the canvas covering, including five basic tones and eighteen faction-inspired patterns (half solid, half striped). The texture can be chosen using the FOMOD installer with either NMM or MO.

I've also included a custom inventory model for the market stall, because why not.

[b][size=4]Installation:[/size][/b]

First, install the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35305/]original mod[/url] if you haven't already. I shouldn't even need to say that.
Second, install my file using the mod manager of your choice. Choose the texture you want using the installer.
Allow my esp to overwrite the one from Your Market Stall! (If you are using NMM I recommend making a backup of the original file first. If you are using MO, just set my mod lower in the left panel.)

[b][size=4]Uninstallation:[/size][/b]

If you need to manually uninstall for some reason, delete meshes\tpishek\ and textures\tpishek\, and restore the esp file from the original mod.

[b][size=4]Known Issues:[/size][/b]

The collision on the awning is a little wonky. This should not affect play, but may be a minor annoyance. In particular, NPCs will probably get stuck on your stall more often than before, subjecting you to a stream of "Yes?" "Yes?" "What is it?" before teleporting away.
If I can figure out ChunkMerge I might try to fix this, or if anyone else wants to try they are more than welcome.

[size=4]Credits:[/size][size=2]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2761530]wgstein[/url] for Your M[/size]arket Stall
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/848320]XunAmarox[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/users/1316898]nyrb[/url] for their FOMOD tutorials
The creators of Nifskope and GIMP

Please feel free to use/modify my assets for any other Skyrim mod, but do respect the permissions laid out by wgstein for the esp.
author: TPishek
